name: FluoroSyl 3750
description: FluoroSyl 3750 is hydrophobic and oleophobic perfluoropolyether derivatives. These coatings provides long-lasting, anti-fouling, anti-fingerprint and anti-smudge properties to properly cleaned surfaces. FluoroSyl bonds to glass, plastic and metal surfaces. This produces an easy-to-clean, low surface energy, low refractive index, transparent, oil, water and stain repellent coating that is less than 10 nanometers thick.
